name: Snakes without Brakes
description:
Snakes without Brakes is a snake puzzle game where you cannot stop unless you hit a block. Use your length to your advantage to reach new places but be careful so you don't get stuck! Think about what order to eat the food in so your snake is the optimal length to solve the 20 puzzles.

Supports keyboard, mouse and gamepad controls.

Originally developed for the LOWREZJAM 2020.

Music: https://opengameart.org/content/happy-adventure-loop
